text: <@U7ADCU3BM> this kind of section can include a class: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/reusable-sections-in-public-beta>

Hello everyone,
I updated to the latest version of the CLI (3.0.8) and tried the theme validation. In the previous version everything was ok and everything worked, but now I get an error as you can see in the attached image
Hey Giovanni - if you upgrade to version `3.0.9-beta.2` that should fix this. We're working on getting out a full release soon with the fix
